Text: When shuffling, you may pick up to 2 cards per Favor you spend to put into your discard pile.

Name: Peaceful Cult
Text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend any number of Favors to trash that many cards from your hand.

Name: Plateau Shepherds
Text: When scoring, pair up your Favors with cards you have costing $2, for 2 per pair.

Name: Trappers' Lodge
Text: When you gain a card, you may spend a Favor to put it onto your deck.

Name: Woodworkers' Guild
Text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend a Favor to trash an Action card from your hand. If you did, gain an Action card.

Name: Cage
Text: Set aside up to 4 cards from your hand face down (on this). The next time you gain a Victory card, trash this, and put the set aside cards into your hand at end of turn.

Name: Grotto
Text: +1 Action Set aside up to 4 cards from your hand face down (on this). At the start of your next turn, discard them, then draw as many.

Name: Jewelled Egg
Text: $1 +1 BuyWhen you trash this, gain a Loot.

Name: Search
Text: +$2 The next time a Supply pile empties, trash this and gain a Loot.

Name: Shaman
Text: +1 Action +$1 You may trash a card from your hand.In games using this, at the start of your turn, gain a card from the trash costing up to $6.

Name: Secluded Shrine
Text: +$1 The next time you gain a Treasure, trash up to 2 cards from your hand.

Name: Siren
Text: Each other player gains a Curse. At the start of your next turn, draw until you have 8 cards in hand.When you gain this, trash it unless you trash an Action from your hand.

Name: Stowaway
Text: At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.When anyone gains a Duration card, you may play this from your hand.

Name: Taskmaster
Text: +1 Action, +$1, and if you gain a card costing exactly $5 this turn, then at the start of your next turn, repeat this ability.

Name: Abundance
Text: The next time you gain an Action card: +1 Buy and +$3.

Name: Cabin Boy
Text: +1 Card +1 Action At the start of your next turn, choose one: +$2; or trash this to gain a Duration card.

Name: Crucible
Text: Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per $1 it costs.

Name: Flagship
Text: +$2 The next time you play a non-Command Action card, replay it.

Name: Fortune Hunter
Text: +$2 Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play a Treasure from them. Put the rest back in any order.

Name: Gondola
Text: Either now or at the start of your next turn: +$2.When you gain this, you may play an Action card from your hand.

Name: Harbor Village
Text: +1 Card +2 Actions After the next Action you play this turn, if it gave you +$, +$1.

Name: Landing Party
Text: +2 Cards +2 Actions The next time the first card you play on a turn is a Treasure, put this onto your deck afterwards.

Name: Mapmaker
Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand and discard the rest.When any player gains a Victory card, you may play this from your hand.

Name: Maroon
Text: Trash a card from your hand. +2 Cards per type it has (Action, Attack, etc.).

Name: Rope
Text: $1 +1 Buy At the start of your next turn, +1 Card and you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Swamp Shacks
Text: +2 Actions +1 Card per 3 cards you have in play (round down).

Name: Tools
Text: Gain a copy of a card anyone has in play.

Name: Buried Treasure
Text: At the start of your next turn, +1 Buy and +$3.When you gain this, play it.

Name: Crew
Text: +3 Cards At the start of your next turn, put this onto your deck.

Name: Cutthroat
Text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. The next time anyone gains a Treasure costing $5 or more, gain a Loot.

Name: Enlarge
Text: Now and at the start of your next turn: Trash a card from your hand, and gain one costing up to $2 more.

Name: Figurine
Text: +2 Cards You may discard an Action card for +1 Buy and +$1.

Name: First Mate
Text: Play any number of Action cards with the same name from your hand, then draw until you have 6 cards in hand.

Name: Frigate
Text: +$3 Until the start of your next turn, each time another player plays an Action card, they discard down to 4 cards in hand afterwards.

Name: Longship
Text: +2 Actions At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

Name: Mining Road
Text: +1 Action +1 Buy +$2 Once this turn, when you gain a Treasure, you may play it.

Name: Pendant
Text: +$1 per differently named Treasure you have in play.

Name: Pickaxe
Text: $1 Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $3 or more, gain a Loot to your hand.

Name: Pilgrim
Text: +4 Cards Put a card from your hand onto your deck.

Name: Quartermaster
Text: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game, choose one: Gain a card costing up to $4, setting it aside on this; or put a card from this into your hand.

Name: Silver Mine
Text: Gain a Treasure costing less than this to your hand.

Name: Trickster
Text: Each other player gains a Curse. Once this turn, when you discard a Treasure from play, you may set it aside. Put it in your hand at end of turn.

Name: Wealthy Village
Text: +1 Card +2 ActionsWhen you gain this, if you have at least 3 differently named Treasures in play, gain a Loot.

Name: Sack of Loot
Text: $1 +1 Buy Gain a Loot.

Name: King's Cache
Text: You may play a Treasure from your hand 3 times.

Name: Amphora
Text: Either now or at the start of your next turn: +1 Buy and +$3.

Name: Doubloons
Text: $3When you gain this, gain a Gold.

Name: Endless Chalice
Text: Now and at the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game: $1 +1 Buy

Name: Figurehead
Text: $3 At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

Name: Hammer
Text: $3 Gain a card costing up to $4.

Name: Insignia
Text: $3 This turn, when you gain a card, you may put it onto your deck.

Name: Jewels
Text: $3 +1 Buy At the start of your next turn, put this on the bottom of your deck.

Name: Orb
Text: Look through your discard pile. Choose one: Play an Action or Treasure from it; or +1 Buy and +$3.

Name: Prize Goat
Text: $3 +1 Buy You may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Puzzle Box
Text: $3 +1 Buy You may set aside a card from your hand face down. Put it into your hand at end of turn.

Name: Sextant
Text: $3 +1 Buy Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard any number. Put the rest back in any order.

Name: Shield
Text: $3 +1 BuyWhen another player plays an Attack, you may first reveal this from your hand to be unaffected.

Name: Spell Scroll
Text: Trash this to gain a cheaper card. If it's an Action or Treasure, you may play it.

Name: Staff
Text: $3 +1 Buy You may play an Action from your hand.

Name: Sword
Text: $3 +1 Buy Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.

Name: Bury
Text: +1 Buy Put any card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

Name: Avoid
Text: +1 Buy The next time you shuffle this turn, pick up to 3 of those cards to put into your discard pile.

Name: Deliver
Text: +1 Buy This turn, each time you gain a card, set it aside, and put it into your hand at end of turn.

Name: Peril
Text: You may trash an Action card from your hand to gain a Loot.

Name: Rush
Text: +1 Buy The next time you gain an Action card this turn, play it.

Name: Foray
Text: Discard 3 cards, revealing them. If they have 3 different names, gain a Loot.

Name: Launch
Text: Once per turn: Return to your Action phase. +1 Card, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.

Name: Mirror
Text: +1 Buy The next time you gain an Action card this turn, gain a copy of it.

Name: Prepare
Text: Set aside your hand face up. At the start of your next turn, play those Actions and Treasures in any order, then discard the rest.

Name: Scrounge
Text: Choose one: Trash a card from your hand; or gain an Estate from the trash, and if you did, gain a card costing up to $5.

Name: Journey
Text: You don't discard cards from play in Clean-up this turn. Take an extra turn after this one (but not a 3rd turn in a row).

Name: Maelstrom
Text: Trash 3 cards from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand trashes one of them.

Name: Looting
Text: Gain a Loot.

Name: Invasion
Text: You may play an Attack from your hand. Gain a Duchy. Gain an Action onto your deck. Gain a Loot; play it.

Name: Prosper
Text: Gain a Loot, plus any number of differently named Treasures.

Name: Cheap
Text: Cheap cards cost $1 less.

Name: Cursed
Text: When you gain a Cursed card, gain a Loot and a Curse.

Name: Fated
Text: When shuffling, you may look through the cards and reveal Fated cards to put them on the top or bottom.

Name: Fawning
Text: When you gain a Province, gain a Fawning card.

Name: Friendly
Text: At the start of your Clean-up phase, you may discard a Friendly card to gain a Friendly card.

Name: Hasty
Text: When you gain a Hasty card, set it aside, and play it at the start of your next turn.

Name: Inherited
Text: Setup: You start the game with an Inherited card in place of a starting card you choose.

Name: Inspiring
Text: After playing an Inspiring card on your turn, you may play an Action from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play.

Name: Nearby
Text: When you gain a Nearby card, +1 Buy.

Name: Patient
Text: At the start of your Clean-up phase, you may set aside Patient cards from your hand to play them at the start of your next turn.

Name: Pious
Text: When you gain a Pious card, you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Reckless
Text: Follow the instructions of played Reckless cards twice. When discarding one from play, return it to its pile.

Name: Rich
Text: When you gain a Rich card, gain a Silver.

Name: Shy
Text: At the start of your turn, you may discard one Shy card for +2 Cards.

Name: Tireless
Text: When you discard a Tireless card from play, set it aside, and put it onto your deck at end of turn.

Name: Mountain Shrine
Text: +1Sun.png +$2 You may trash a card from your hand. Then if there are any Action cards in the trash, +2 Cards.

Name: Daimyo
Text: +1 Card +1 Action The next time you play a non-Command Action card this turn, replay it afterwards.

Name: Artist
Text: +1 Action +1 Card per card you have exactly one copy of in play.

Name: Fishmonger
Text: +1 Buy +$1You can play this from your deck as if in your hand.

Name: Snake Witch
Text: +1 Card +1 Action If your hand has no duplicate cards, you may reveal it and return this to its pile, to have each other play gain a Curse.

Name: Aristocrat
Text: If the number of Aristrocrats you have in play is: 1 or 5: +3 Actions; 2 or 6: +3 Cards; 3 or 7: +$3; 4 or 8: +3 Buys.

Name: Craftsman
Text: + 2D Gain a card costing up to $5.

Name: Riverboat
Text: At the start of your next turn, play the set aside card, leaving it there.Setup: Set-aside an unused non-Duration Action card costing $5.

Name: Root Cellar
Text: +3 Cards +1 Action + 3D

Name: Alley
Text: +1 Card +1 Action Discard a card.You can play this from your deck as if in your hand.

Name: Change
Text: If you have any D, +$3. Otherwise, trash a card from your hand, and gain a card costing more $ than it. + D equal to the difference in $.

Name: Ninja
Text: +1 Card Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.You can play this from your deck as if in your hand.

Name: Poet
Text: +1Sun.png +1 Card +1 Action Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs $3 or less, put it into your hand.

Name: River Shrine
Text: +1Sun.png Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. At the start of Clean-up, if you didn't gain any cards during your Buy phase this turn, gain a card costing up to $4.

Name: Rustic Village
Text: +1Sun.png +1 Card +2 Actions You may discard 2 cards for +1 Card.

Name: Gold Mine
Text: +1 Card +1 Action +1 Buy You may gain a Gold and get + 4D.

Name: Imperial Envoy
Text: +5 Cards +1 Buy + 2D

Name: Kitsune
Text: +1Sun.png Choose two different options: +2 Actions; +$2; each other player gains a Curse; gain a Silver.

Name: Litter
Text: +2 Cards +2 Actions + 1D

Name: Rice Broker
Text: +1 Action Trash a card from your hand. If it's a Treasure, +2 Cards. If it's an Action, +5 Cards.

Name: Ronin
Text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand.You can play this from your deck as if in your hand.

Name: Tanuki
Text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $2 more than it.You can play this from your deck as if in your hand.

Name: Tea House
Text: +1Sun.png +1 Card +1 Action +$2

Name: Samurai
Text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand (once). At the start of each of your turns this game, +$1. (This stays in play.)

Name: Rice
Text: +1 Buy +$1 per different type among cards you have in play.

Name: Continue
Text: Once per turn: Gain a non-Attack Action card costing up to $4. Return to your Action phase and play it. +1 Action and +1 Buy.

Name: Amass
Text: If you have no Action cards in play, gain an Action card costing up to $5.

Name: Asceticism
Text: Pay any amount of $ to trash that many cards from your hand.

Name: Credit
Text: Gain an Action or Treasure costing up to $8. + D equal to its cost.

Name: Foresight
Text: Reveal cards from your deck until revealing an Action. Set it aside and discard the rest. Put it into your hand at end of turn.

Name: Kintsugi
Text: Trash a card from your hand. If you've gained a Gold this game, gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.

Name: Practice
Text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.

Name: Sea Trade
Text: +1 Card per Action card you have in play. Trash up to that many cards from your hand.

Name: Receive Tribute
Text: If you've gained at least 3 cards this turn, gain up to 3 differently named Action cards you don't have copies of in play.

Name: Gather
Text: Gain a card costing exactly $3, a card costing exactly $4, and a card costing exactly $5.

Name: Approaching Army
Text: After you play an Attack card, +$1.Setup: Add an Attack kingdom card pile to the Supply.

Name: Biding Time
Text: At the start of your Clean-up, set aside your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put those cards into your hand.

Name: Bureaucracy
Text: When you gain a card that doesn't cost $0, gain a Copper.

Name: Divine Wind
Text: When you remove the last Sun.png, remove all Kingdom card piles from the Supply, and set up 10 new random piles.

Name: Enlightenment
Text: Treasures are also Actions. When you play a Treasure in an Action phase, instead of following its instructions, +1 Card and +1 Action.

Name: Flourishing Trade
Text: Cards cost $1 less. You may use Action plays as Buys.

Name: Good Harvest
Text: The first time you play each differently named Treasure each turn, first, +1 Buy and +$1.

Name: Great Leader
Text: After each Action card you play, +1 Action.

Name: Growth
Text: When you gain a Treasure, gain a cheaper card.

Name: Harsh Winter
Text: When you gain a card on your turn, if there's D on its pile, take it; otherwise put 2D on its pile.

Name: Kind Emperor
Text: At the start of your turn, and when you remove the last Sun.png: Gain an Action to your hand.

Name: Panic
Text: When you play a treasure, +2 Buys, and when you discard one from play, return it to its pile.

Name: Progress
Text: When you gain a card, put it onto your deck.

Name: Rapid Expansion
Text: When you gain an Action or Treasure, set it aside, and play it at the start of your next turn.

Name: Sickness
Text: At the start of your turn, choose one: Gain a Curse onto your deck; or discard 3 cards.

Name: Black Market
Text: +$2  Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. Play any number of Treasures from your hand. You may buy one of the revealed cards. Put the rest on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.Setup: Make a Black Market deck out of different unused Kingdom cards.

Name: Church
Text: +1 Action Set aside up to 3 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand, then you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Dismantle
Text: Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $1 or more, gain a cheaper card and a Gold.

Name: Envoy
Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

Name: Sauna
Text: +1 Card +1 Action You may play an Avanto from your hand. This turn, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Walled Village
Text: +1 Card +2 ActionsAt the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this onto your deck.

Name: Avanto
Text: +3 Cards You may play a Sauna from your hand.

Name: Governor
Text: +1 Action Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from their hand and gain a card costing exactly $1 ($2) more.

Name: Stash
Text: $2 When shuffling this, you may look through your remaining deck, and may put this anywhere in the shuffled cards.

Name: Marchland
Text: Worth 1 per 3 Victory cards you have (round down).When you gain this, +1 Buy, and discard any number of cards for +$1 each.

Name: Summon
Text: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Set it aside. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

Name: Captain
Text: Now and at the start of your next turn: Play a non-Duration non-Command Action card from the Supply costing up to $4, leaving it there.

Name: Prince
Text: You may set aside (on this) a non-Duration non-Command Action card from your hand costing up to $4. At the start of each of your turns, play that card, leaving it set aside.
